DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether religiosity and spirituality are related to immune functioning, as measured by interleukin-6 blood plasma level, among terminally ill cancer patients.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Inpatient at Calvary Hospital Diagnosis of terminal cancer Score of 20 or above on MiniMental State Exam Exclusion criteria: Presence of a psychiatric disorder that would preclude the production of meaningful data
